title: Steam Deck Docking Station gets a major pre-launch stealth upgrade
content:
I love my Steam Deck. So do a lot of other people. But the thing many of the early owners are missing is a good dock. Valve has an official one in the works but it’s not quite ready yet. Now, we have some indication as to perhaps why that is. It looks like the

The post Steam Deck Docking Station gets a major pre-launch stealth upgrade appeared first on xda-developers.
description: Valve has quietly upgraded the Steam Deck Docking Station before it goes on sale and it's a pretty big deal for prospective buyers.
